short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetches News related to a location on Google Maps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want to be updated with the news of a location? Download this extension, go to Google Maps and click on that location. A News API will fetch data across thousands of articles to find news related to that location. If you don't want to be that guy in the conversation who knows nothing about whats going on, download location specs now!
